description: FastAPI router module handling bookmark-related endpoints for recipes, including adding, removing, and listing bookmarks.

methods.name: bookmark_recipe( data: BookmarkCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user) )
methods.description: Endpoint to create a new bookmark for a recipe, checking for existing bookmarks and recipe existence.

methods.name: remove_bookmark(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to remove a bookmark for a specific recipe if it exists.

methods.name: list_bookmarks(db: Session = Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user))
methods.description: Endpoint to list all bookmarked recipes for the current user.

ctags.name: bookmark_recipe
ctags.signature: ( data: BookmarkCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user) )

ctags.name: remove_bookmark
ctags.pattern: /^def remove_bookmark(recipe_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), user=Depends(get_current_user/
